promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a dynamic basic ibex grass-type pokemon wearing a wooden crown. It can be found in forest-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, grass or ibex. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Thronalix, a a dynamic basic ibex grass-type pokemon. It can be found in forest-like environments It has the following abilities: Stun Spore. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "ibex", "grass" or "Thronalix". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of grass-type pokemon, ibex-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, green and teal ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This woodland dweller uses its spiral horns to elegantly traverse dense foliage, while stunning foes with powerful pollen bursts.
